itunes:title: Episode 575 - Special Guest The Bachelor Colton Underwood
title: Episode 575 - Special Guest The Bachelor Colton Underwood
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson is joined by Jessie Wiseman and Tiffany Hart in a Drinkin’ Broettes crossover show and welcome ABC “The Bachelor’s” Colton Underwood to discuss the release of his new book “The First Time”, what it was like to be on “The Bachelor”, he shar...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson is joined by Jessie Wiseman and Tiffany Hart in a Drinkin’ Broettes crossover show and welcome ABC “The Bachelor’s” Colton Underwood to discuss the release of his new book “The First Time”, what it was like to be on “The Bachelor”, he shares some funny behind-the-scenes details in the filming of the show, and talks about his transition from The Bachelor to the rest of his professional career.

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
